column5: Fantastic !!!  congratulations !!
Thats FANTASTIC!!! Congrats!!
Congrats Ryan. Very cool My eldest daughter's middle name is Grace too.
Great news Ryan, congrats !!!!  Maureen
Thats good to hear Ryan!
Awesome news!  Congrats enjoy the new little one.
Thats awesome buddy saw the pics on FB she's adorable can't wait to meet her
The hat-trick becomes official on the scoreboard  Congrats to the both of you!
Great to here it Ryan congrats to you guys. Now get out there before the ice is gone
So glad to here she's ok Ryan,congrads
Congratulations to you and your family Ryan!
See... just like I told you last week !!  (but I'm not paying her Tuition!!!)
Congrats to you and your family Ryan
DC Friday?
FANTASTIC ..... looks like a healthy little fishing partner for Averie and u
wrapped around her finger yet .  i was the second i saw my little princess   congratts its an incredible ride
Fantastic!!!! news Ryan, congrats to you and your family  Sandro
Congrads again Ryan, saw the picture on FB. Very fortunate, glad you take these kids out into the world as much as you do. Looking forward to the reports again =)   MTBF

They miscalculated her weight by a mile and had us all bent out of shape for nothing!!!    Baby Claira Grace Bonin was born @ 8:30 last night and was 5lbs 8oz ( slightly lighter than my average bass )    Thank you all very much for your thoughts and words of encouragement! Now back to being a stress free Dad!  Look out ice out gators and crappie, Averie and I are gearin' up!!!!!!!  Ps. Photobucket isn't working on my iPad.... Maybe one of my homies can post a pic from facebook or something for me?  Cheers for now!  Ryan and Family
Unreal, that's kind of maddening Ryan!  Most importantly everyone is fine including your new arrival. Huge congratulations to you and the missus!  Thanks for posting.
Cograts to the whole family Ryan.
congrats Ryan and family!
Now that's great news Ryan Glad that all is OK     Congrats to the both of you, Claira is a real cuttie
Congrats !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Finally a positive note to cheer up the board
You could not have made my day better Ryan. Sincerely. Now get out there and get some fish...you now have another mouth to feed!  MAN, that is GREAT news!
congrats! im glad everything turned out well but really, is there such thing as "a stress free dad" lol
Congrads!
Wonderful news Ryan!!! Congratulations.  She's a cutie  Ken
Congratulations Ryan.  What a bunch of worry for nothing.  Glad it all turned out okay!  Joey
Now I'm smiling.  Great news Ryan, very happy for all of you.
Awesome news!!! And man, what a cutie!!!! HH
Thats awesome Ryan, and what a beautiful baby !!!! Congratulations !!
Absolutely wonderful news Ryan and congratulations to your entire family on the arrival of your gorgeous new daughter.
Great to hear it! congrats to you and your family!
Glad everything worked out and Congrats Ryan!
Another beautiful little angel.  Better stock up on pink fishing gear.
That's great news.
Congratulations, Ryan, to you and the rest of the family. Glad to hear everything's good.  JF
awesome !!!! congrats
Congrats Ryan. Had a granddaughter born last Sept and grandson at Christmas at the same weight. Grandaughter is now 13 and grand son is at 10+; just like weeds.
Great news Ryan!! Congrats to everyone!! What a cutie!  :thumbsup_anim:
